name: Pain Conductors
description:
Duke it out with enemy trains in this Arcade Top-Down Shooter! Collect you fallen enemies cars to add to your own arsenal to crush you enemies! Don't run into your own train though... Can you get the high score in this "On-Rails" Shooter? 

Instructions explained in game. Press F for fullscreen.

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours
